Summary of what I checked
- I confirmed on GitHub that alicemiller/sorting_searching has a pending collaborator invitation for emma.johnson@bluesparrowtech.com.
- I could not find an unread GitHub invitation message in the linked inbox to accept automatically. Accepting requires you to click the invitation link (in email) or accept it while signed in to GitHub.

What you can do to accept the invite
1. Check your email (including Spam/Junk) for a message from GitHub with a "View invitation" / "Accept invitation" button and click it.
2. Sign in to GitHub and accept from the web:
   - Visit https://github.com/invitations while signed in — pending repository invitations are listed there; or
   - Go to https://github.com/alicemiller/sorting_searching while signed in — you should see an invitation banner on the repo page with an Accept button; or
   - Click the bell (notifications) in the top-right of GitHub and look for the invitation notification.
3. If you still can’t find it, ask Alice to re-send the invitation (or invite your GitHub username instead of your email). Alice can also revoke the pending invite and invite you again.

If you want, I can:
- Re-check the GitHub-linked inbox for new unread invitations now and again later.
- Help draft a short message you can send to Alice asking her to re-invite.

Which of the two follow-ups would you like me to do now?
